entry.title: my first blog
entry.content:
About the blog

A new gTLD is open to registering, it is a ugly suffix .pw. But I like new things, so I had this domain name registered.

It’s aimed to blog something about web security here though I don’t know too much about it. I hope it will tracing my learning’s curve, but meanwhile not annoying you guys who run into here. So I should write most of it in chinese except this piece ;)

THX~

Who am I

I’m just a Perler learning Ruby and Rails these days. Love progarmming, web app developing and thinking day & dreames.

Be nice. Be consistent.
